columns.name: FORMULARY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the formulary record. The formulary is the list of approved medications at a hospital.

columns.name: FORMULARY_ID_FORMULARY_DESC
columns.description: This column contains a description of the formulary. The formulary is the list of approved medications at a hospital.

columns.name: FORMULARY_DESC
columns.description: This column contains a description of the formulary. The formulary is the list of approved medications at a hospital.
